## Installing `VANTDET`

To install the development version from github:
```{r eval=FALSE}
library(devtools)
install_github("n8thangreen/VANTDET")
```

Then, to load the package, use:
```{r eval=FALSE}
library("VANTDET")
```

See package [Vignette]() for more details and examples.
